page.title: 16DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: It is Monday morning. I woke up with the sun shining in the window. It looked as if it was going to be a hot and sticky day. I went down stairs. A smell of burnt toast was in the room. I got a bowl of cornflakes and began to eat them. I Read the news paper. The head lines said "rock concert went of with a bang". I finished eating and had a wash. After that i got dressed and went to feed my rabbit. I got my school bag ready and left for school. We walked up the road and passed all the traffic which was lined up along our road. We crossed on the zebra crossing and went past the cinema. The school bell goes at 9 o clock. We went in and hung our coat's up. This morning we did maths. Then we went into assembly. We sat right up the back.Gary started to do his meditating and every one kept laughing.
